channel.title: Networking on Olivia Snowden's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Networking on Olivia Snowden's Blog

item.title: HOME-LAB SETUP
item.description: For the home-lab, we used the following devices: Ubiquiti EdgeRouter X Ubiquiti UniFi 24 port switch 2 VMware ESXi Hosts A Synology NAS DS420j (Diskstation) Building the home lab also required quite a few patch cables to connect devices, and I made most of them myself. This required UTP cable, plastic clips for the ends, a cable crimping tool, and a lot of patience. The arrangement of the wires, or the pinout, had to be in a specific order.
